author: Esther Zuckerman
title: Newswire: Taika Waititi doesnâ€™t care if you donâ€™t like that Thor: Ragnarok will be funny
text:
Share Tweet 
Taika Waititi has promised that his Thor movie will be in his hilarious voice , which is exciting to fans of Taika Waititi and apparently worrisome to people who donâ€™t like their superhero movies absurd, winsome, and utterly delightful. Some Twitter users are asking Waititi how he feels about these dissenters. Waititiâ€™s response is the sound of a fart emitting. No, really. P tttt (fart sound)... ðŸ˜‹ https://t.co/QCNpDcJFam â€” Taika Waititi (@TaikaWaititi) February 19, 2017 Sounds like they need to laugh. https://t.co/fCB5AwQoDA â€” Taika Waititi (@TaikaWaititi) February 21, 2017 
Waititi also took on the claim that fans are displeased with the logo for the film, which has a distinctly â€˜80s flare . If you were one of those people hoping that he would take things seriously, then his answer should please you. Iâ€™d say: Once you leave school, move out of home, & become a cog in the slow death machine, logos will be the last thing you get angry about https://t.co/p4Ufma148z â€” Taika Waititi (@TaikaWaititi) February 21, 2017 
Thor: Ragnarokâ€” which, like it or not, will be funnyâ€”is due out November 3.
